channel.title: Distant Memories - xzdnsr [EP]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/xzdnsr/sets/distant-memories-ep-xzdnsr
_Distant Memories_ is a project I worked one during late summer nights in 2017. Consisting of 4 official tracks, this EP was originally supposed to have more, but I decided not to add them since I didn't quite like them. The tracks you hear in this EP are the ones I liked the best.
What do you think? What's your favorite track? Leave any comments here and enjoy the music!

item.title: Distant Memories - xzdnsr [EP]
item.dc:creator: Mr_Mooo
item.description:
I really like how all the songs are peaceful. Hopes is a little repetitive, but overall It’s a great EP. Well done!

Read full topic
